summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8557 lux) and cloud levels (up 386 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 7763 lux), and cloud levels (up 200 m) when compared to today.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 412m minimum and 1807m maximum, with an average of 667.4m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 867.7m and 847.9m.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air moisture should feel ok and winds should remain light. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather will likely remain the same.
